% example LaTeX code to use psgo_emitter-generated files
% save the problem files in problems/ subdirectory

\documentclass[paper=a5,DIV=14]{scrbook}
\usepackage{psgo}

\newcounter{ProblemNumber}
\newcommand\solution[2]{
  \begin{minipage}[b]{0.49\textwidth}
    \center{\input{#1}}
    \center{\textbf{\theProblemNumber.} {solution #2.}}
  \end{minipage}%
  \bigskip
}

\setgounit{0.4cm}

\begin{document}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\foreach \i in {1, 2, ..., 999} {%
  \edef\FileName{problems/problem-\i}%
  \IfFileExists{\FileName}{%
    \refstepcounter{ProblemNumber}
    \foreach \j in {1, 2, ..., 9} {%
      \edef\SolName{problems/problem-\i-sol-\j}%
      \IfFileExists{\SolName}{%
        \solution{\SolName}{\j}
      }
    }
  }
}

\end{document}
